Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Orchard Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Leviathan Drive and Orchard Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Orchard Lane runs east from the intersection with Leviathan Drive, running north and south. Orchard seems to run through the large forest area on both sides of the road. On the west side of the intersection, you can see the mysterious Avatar Ruins.
